summary:
This mod adds a new stand-alone follower.
They have a special ability and magic.
They are strong hero followers.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ssuex9A.jpg[/img]
Sorry,I am not good at English.
This is a machine translation.

####About this mod####
This mod adds a new stand-alone follower.
They have a special ability and magic.
They are strong hero followers.

####Change Log####
v1.1…added books to learn the special ability to followers
          Balin: He has a "Spellbook dragon blood"
          Balan: He has a "Spellbook Thunder Break"

v1.2…added Galehalt to new follower.
         was a little modify the face of Balin
         Dragon Aspect of Balin it will activate the following HP80%

v1.3…It was fixed face of Balin and Balan.
         Fixed a known issue with the Dragon Aspect
         Fixed recovery frequency of Galehalt to 1 battle once

v1.3.1…Modification of the texture file


[img]http://i.imgur.com/HcMfnB3.jpg[/img]
##Hero Follower Balin##

Essential and cannot die. He can be married.

Required DLC:Dragonborn.

Combat style:Two-handed,Heavy Armor.
Perk:Two-handed,Heavy Armor,Block,and Light Foot.

Location:Dragons Reach.
09:00 Dragons Reach
12:00 Dragons Reach (lunch in the hall)
13:00 Great porch and if sunny. Other weather Dragons Reach.
17:00 Dragons Reach (dinner in the hall).
19:00 Bernard-Mare.
02:00 Dragons Reach.
03:00 Great porch.
04:00 The training at Great porch.

Specific ability:
1.THSofGods:Attack speed UP and both hands weapon damage UP of both hands weapon.
2.Dragon blood:Triggering When the HP falls below 20%, to strengthen the body by awaken the blood of Dragon. 
Increasing the damage of both hands weapon 50%, to give a defense value +75, the HP and 1000 to recover immediately.
3.Dragon Aspect of Balin it will activate the following HP80%
options file do not want the HP management DoragonAspect

CustomVoice version　「[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69224?]CustomVoice_HeroFollowerBalin[/url]」



[img]http://i.imgur.com/V0SwpDS.jpg[/img]
##Hero Follower Balan##

Essential and cannot die. He can be married.

Combat style:One-handed,Light Armor
Perk:One-handed,Light Armor,Destruction,and Light Foot

Location:The Bee and Barb
09:00 Mara temple.
12:00 Riften of market
17:00 The Bee and Barb

Special magic:
1.Special Thunderbolt:High power Thunderbolt. In giving -20% lightning resistance.
2.Special Lightning Cloak:Lightning Cloak where the defense value to +100.





[img]http://i.imgur.com/cXTvNoa.jpg[/img]
##Hero Follower Galehalt##

Essential and cannot die. 

Combat style:Bare hands,Heavy Armor.
Perk:Heavy Armor,Destruction,Restoration and Light Foot
The follower is the setting that the original High King.

Location:Blue Palace
Special magic:
1.High-King-Fist:Deathblow that only High King were allowed.
2.High-King-[b]Healing:Followers sometimes recover.
3.Fist weapon release was enchanted
Weapons have from the beginning, please do not drop because it is transparent.
[/b]
####Known problem####
1.Go away Dropping the fist weapon is transparent.

####Recommended MOD####
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by [b]tktk1

MOD to strengthen the enemy[/b]
